com.tomscz.afswinx.validation

Class MinAndMaxValueValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomscz.afswinx.validation.AFBaseValidator
      • com.tomscz.afswinx.validation.NumberValidator
        • com.tomscz.afswinx.validation.MinAndMaxValueValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AFValidations

    public class MinAndMaxValueValidator
extends NumberValidator
    This validator validate minimal and maximal value of field. It could be used only on number. Default validation is against Integer. Based on SupportedWidgets type we are able to validate against Long SupportedWidgets.NUMBERLONGFIELD , Double SupportedWidgets.NUMBERDOUBLEFIELD, Integer SupportedWidgets.NUMBERFIELD.
    Since:
    1.0.0.
    Author:
    Martin Tomasek (martin@toms-cz.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • MinAndMaxValueValidator

        public MinAndMaxValueValidator(SupportedWidgets widget,
                       java.lang.String value,
                       boolean isMinValidation)
                        throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Constructor to create minimum value validator. It specify minimum value of field. And based on widget type it determine which type should be used. Default validation is against integer
        Parameters:
        widget - of component. Based on them will be validator set up
        value - minimal or maximal value.
        isMinValidation - if true then minimal value is expected, if false then maximal value is expected
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - If value cannot be converted to number then NumberFormatException is thrown

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public void validate(AFSwinx swinxInstance,
            AFSwinxPanel parentPanel,
            java.lang.Object value)
              throws ValidationException
        Description copied from interface: AFValidations
        Every validator must implement this method. If exception is thrown, that indicates, that validation was failed. You can use resource bundle. Just simply use LocalizationUtils to made localization on texts.
        Specified by:
        validate in interface AFValidations
        Overrides:
        validate in class NumberValidator
        Parameters:
        swinxInstance - global instance of AFSwinx
        parentPanel - this is parent which holds data fields and all necessary informations
        value - concrete value
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if validation is failed then this exception will be thrown
